feed.title: Google Cloud: reCAPTCHA
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: reCAPTCHA

entry.content: reCAPTCHA Mobile SDK v18.8.1 is available for iOS. This version fixes an issue with iOS 26 screen time showing use from recaptcha.net
entry.summary: reCAPTCHA Mobile SDK v18.8.1 is now available for iOS. This update resolves an issue where iOS screen time incorrectly attributed usage to recaptcha.net.
entry.title: Changed: reCAPTCHA Mobile SDK v18.8.1 for iOS

entry.content: reCAPTCHA Mobile SDK v18.8.0 is available for Android. This version contains reliability improvements and bug fixes.
entry.summary: We have released version 18.8.0 of the reCAPTCHA Mobile SDK for Android. This update includes reliability enhancements and bug fixes.
entry.title: Changed: reCAPTCHA Mobile SDK v18.8.0 for Android

entry.content:
reCAPTCHA Mobile SDK 18.8.0 is available for iOS. This version contains the following changes:

  • Reliability improvements and bug fixes
  • Swift 6 and Xcode 26.0 support
  • The minimum supported version is iOS 15. This is in accordance with the compatibility guidelines for Xcode 16.
entry.summary: The reCAPTCHA Mobile SDK for iOS has been updated to version 18.8.0. This release includes reliability improvements, bug fixes, and support for Swift 6 and Xcode 16. The minimum supported iOS version is now 15.
entry.title: Changed: reCAPTCHA Mobile SDK for iOS updated

entry.content: reCAPTCHA Mobile SDK v18.8.0-beta03 is available for Android. This version contains reliability improvements and bug fixes.
entry.summary: New beta version of reCAPTCHA Mobile SDK for Android is out, bringing reliability improvements and bug fixes.
entry.title: Changed: reCAPTCHA Mobile SDK v18.8.0-beta03 for Android

entry.content: reCAPTCHA Mobile SDK 18.8.0-beta02 is now available for iOS. This version contains reliability improvements and bug fixes.
entry.summary: The reCAPTCHA Mobile SDK for iOS has been updated to version 18.8.0-beta02. This release focuses on enhancing reliability and addressing bugs.
entry.title: Changed: reCAPTCHA Mobile SDK for iOS Updated

entry.content:
Transaction Defense Reasons is generally available. This feature enhances transparency by providing clear, human-readable explanations for why a particular transaction receives a high transaction risk score. The reasons help you better understand the risk assessments and take more informed actions to protect against fraud.

For more information, see Risk reason.
entry.summary: Transaction Defense Reasons is now generally available. This feature provides clear explanations for high transaction risk scores, helping you understand fraud assessments and take informed actions.
entry.title: Feature: Transaction Defense Reasons Now Generally Available

entry.content:
We've enhanced the reCAPTCHA Admin console to provide a more intuitive interface for configuring risk score thresholds. These improvements help you define how to act on different risk scores. You can also get a better understanding of the transactions that will exceed the threshold which can help in deciding what you allow, block or further reviewing transactions.

For more information, see Protect payment transactions with Fraud Prevention.
entry.summary: Configure risk score thresholds with a more intuitive interface in the reCAPTCHA Admin console. Understand which transactions exceed thresholds to better manage payments.
entry.title: Feature: Intuitive risk score threshold configuration

entry.content: reCAPTCHA policy-based challenge keys are now available in Preview. With policy-based challenge keys, you can configure reCAPTCHA to deterministically trigger CAPTCHA challenges based on a score threshold and challenge difficulty. For more information about the policy-based challenge keys, see reCAPTCHA keys overview.
entry.summary: reCAPTCHA policy-based challenge keys are now available in preview.
entry.title: Feature: reCAPTCHA policy-based challenge keys now in preview

entry.content:
reCAPTCHA Mobile SDK v18.8.0-beta02 is available for Android.

This version contains the following changes:

  • Reliability improvements and bug fixes.
  • The minimum supported version of Android is 23.
entry.summary: This is a short summary for a title.
entry.title: Changed: reCAPTCHA Mobile SDK v18.8.0-beta02 for Android

entry.content:
reCAPTCHA Mobile SDK 18.8.0-beta01 is now available for iOS.

This version contains the following changes:

  • Support for Swift 6 and Xcode 26.0 beta01.
  • Minimum supported version is set to iOS 15 in accordance with https://developer.apple.com/support/xcode/ for Xcode 16.
entry.summary: The reCAPTCHA Mobile SDK for iOS has been updated to version 18.8.0-beta01. This release includes support for Swift 6 and Xcode 26.0 beta01, and sets the minimum supported iOS version to 15, aligning with Xcode 16 requirements.
entry.title: Changed: reCAPTCHA Mobile SDK for iOS updated

entry.content:
reCAPTCHA Mobile SDK v18.8.0-beta01 is now available for Android

This version contains reliability improvements and bug fixes.
entry.summary: The latest beta version of reCAPTCHA Mobile SDK for Android, v18.8.0-beta01, has been released. This update focuses on enhancing reliability and fixing existing bugs.
entry.title: Changed: reCAPTCHA Mobile SDK for Android v18.8.0-beta01 Now Available
